item.title: Not eating meat for one day is one day of compassion.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: “Not eating meat for one day is one day of compassion. Not eating meat for six days is six days of compassion. Not eating meat for ten days is ten days of compassion. This is a way to cultivate our sympathy, kindness and compassion.” MASTER SHENG YEN
item.content:encoded:
“Not eating meat for one day is one day of compassion. Not eating meat for six days is six days of compassion. Not eating meat for ten days is ten days of compassion. This is a way to cultivate our sympathy, kindness and compassion.”

MASTER SHENG YEN
